text: Backlash (2008) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE). It took place on April 27, 2008 at the 1st Mariner Arena in Baltimore, Maryland. It was the tenth Backlash event held by WWE. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 John Morrison and The Miz defeated Jimmy Wang Yang and Shannon Moore Tag team match N/A 2 Matt Hardy defeated Montel Vontavious Porter (c) Singles match for the WWE United States Championship 11:24 3 Kane (c) defeated Chavo Guerrero (with Bam Neely) Singles match for the ECW Championship 8:49 4 The Big Show defeated The Great Khali Singles match 8:05 5 Shawn Michaels defeated Batista Singles match with Chris Jericho as the special guest referee 14:59 6 Beth Phoenix, Melina, Layla, Jillian Hall, Victoria and Natalya defeated Mickie James, Maria, Ashley, Michelle McCool, Cherry and Kelly Kelly 12-Diva tag team match 6:31 7 The Undertaker (c) defeated Edge by submission Singles match for the World Heavyweight Championship 18:26 8 Triple H defeated Randy Orton (c), John Cena, and John "Bradshaw" Layfield Four-way elimination match for the WWE Championship 29:22 ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Backlash 2008 website Category:2008 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in Baltimore Category:WWE Backlash Category:2008 in the United States Category:2000s in Baltimore
title: Backlash (2008)
